item.title: Case numbers please help me cmon :/
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

well, i had a WORKING whip spec bar that filled and everything. i jus want the case nums for drag weps

this is the case for my whip spec

case 48023:
if(!specOn)
{
sendQuest("@yel@S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 12335);
specOn = true;
} else {
sendQuest("S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 12335);
specOn = false;
}
break;

Read full topic
item.source: Case numbers please help me cmon :/

item.title: Case numbers please help me cmon :/
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

hippie:

anyone got case ID’s for wepon interfaces? so i can add spec bar to them…

ill give the bar and weapon interfaces but i wont give the filling’s do that yourself =).

note: These arent my own interfaces because these have it on all weapons but i keep mine to myself =D

First add this ABOVE boolean process

public void l33thax(int id) { outStream.createFrame(171); outStream.writeByte(0); outStream.writeWord(id); flushOutStream(); }

then add these under boolean process

l33thax(12323); l33thax(7574); l33thax(7599); l33thax(7549); l33thax(8493); l33thax(7499);

to fill it and make specials you will have to code yourself =D

Read full topic
